44M.F.summary: Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides subsea and drilling services to the offshore oil and gas industries in Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Subsea Group and Holding. It provides subsea services, including inspection, repair and maintenance, infrastructure installation support, remotely operated vehicle (ROV) support, and cable and flexible pipe laying services through operating 7 subsea vessels, 17 saturation and air diving systems, and 13 ROV systems. The company also offers offshore drilling and accommodation rig services through its ownership in 1 tender assist drilling rig, 1 accommodation barge, and 3 high specification premium jack-up drilling rigs. In addition, it engages in the provision of hydrographic survey and positioning services; diving, ROV, and subsea contracting services; and production and exploration drilling services, as well as in the offshore transportation, installation, and decommissioning business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited.

SR-R.BK.summary: Siamraj Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction of natural gas metering and pipeline transmission systems in Thailand. The company offers flow measuring systems and engineering services from branched natural gas pipeline to the power stations, process industrial plants, and natural gas service stations. It also engages in the design, construction, trading, installation, inspection, repairing, maintenance, and service of natural gas metering systems, such as gas chromatographs, flow metering elements, and flow computers and systems; and inspection, repair, and maintenance service of equipment in gas metering stations. In addition, the company owns, operates, and maintains NGV stations in Bangna; designs, supplies, and installs natural gas quality improvement systems; and develops solar energy and other alternative energy projects. Further, it provides manpower, accounting, financial, and maintenance services; and car park services comprising management of parking building and commercial property rental and related services. Additionally, the company provides industrial pump systems, such as gear pumps, sanitary pumps, screw pumps, vacuum systems, diaphragm pumps, process metering, and process centrifugal pumps; industrial and municipal waste treatment air compressors; and gas turbines and compressors for power plants. The company was formerly known as Siamrajathanee Corporation Company Limited and changed its name to Siamraj Public Company Limited in February 2015. Siamraj Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Samutprakarn, Thailand.
